description: This source file implements cryptographic functions for TLS protocol, specifically pseudo-random functions (PRFs) for SSL 3.0 and SSL 3.1, including the functions TlsCpoCompute_PRF30 and TlsCpoCompute_PRF31. It handles secure hash computations, HMAC, and key material expansion relevant to TLS cryptography.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoCompute_PRF30(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,void * i_seed,ULONG i_seed_size,void * o_hash,ULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Computes the TLS 3.0 pseudorandom function (PRF) using MD5 and SHA-1 hashes based on the secret and seed inputs, producing an output hash of specified size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoCompute_PRF31(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,char * i_label,void * i_seed,ULONG i_seed_size,void * o_hash,ULONG o_hash_size)
methods.description: Computes the TLS 3.1 PRF combining MD5 and SHA-1 with a label and seed, implementing the TLS P_hash expansion with HMAC, to produce key material based on the secret.

ctags.name: TlsCpoCompute_PRF30
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,void * i_seed,ULONG i_seed_size,void * o_hash,ULONG o_hash_size)

ctags.name: TlsCpoCompute_PRF31
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,void * i_secret,ULONG i_secret_size,char * i_label,void * i_seed,ULONG i_seed_size,void * o_hash,ULONG o_hash_size)
